name: ここは楽園荘2
summary: The Paradise Heights apartment has changed after half of your uncle's company got liquidated. After the money went, so did some of the tenants. Now Keigo Nakadai (protagonist) works for a toy making company but still stays at Paradise Heights.
info:
• 中文名: 这里是乐园庄2
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 1995/10/20
